name: Cave Adventure (StonrX_games)
description:
Cave Adventure is a 2D game developed by Stonrx games and released on 29/12/2020 . Game contain Adventure and Action is a singleplayer game. Action is in a cave named AWI and player enter in a portal and the whole game takes a turn. 

PC Controls:

  • WASD - Moving
  • Escape - Pause Game
  • Mouse - Select options
  • Alt+Enter - Toggle fullscreen
  • Reset button - Reset all level

These are the Cave Adventure  system requirements (minimum)

  • Memory: 1 GB
  • Graphics Card: NVIDIA GeForce GT 430
  • CPU: Intel Pentium dual Core
  • DirectX: Version 9.1
  • Game File Size: 210 MB
  • OS: Windows 7

These are the Cave Adventure  system requirements (recommended)

  • Memory: 4 GB
  • Graphics Card: NVIDIA GeForce GT 710
  • CPU: Intel Core 2 Duo T7250
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Game File Size: 210 MB
  • OS: Windows 10
